newsitem.title: JORDAN: Jordan signs new trade accord with Israel.
newsitem.headline: Jordan signs new trade accord with Israel.

text.p: Jordan and Israel signed an amended trade accord Wednesday that lifts barriers to Jordanian goods to both the Israeli and West Bank markets, officials said.

The accord, signed at the end of talks between Jordan's Minister of Industry and Trade Ali Abu Al-Ragheb and his Israeli counterpart Natan Sharansky on Israel's Dead Sea shore, extends customs exemptions for most Jordanian goods entering into the Israeli market.
It also removes obstacles to its industry's access to the much coveted Palestinian markets.
